author: vmassol
msg: Big build refactoring to make it much easier to build Cactus. The steps are now: checkout jakarta-cactus from CVS, type "ant -f download.xml" and then "ant" at the top levels (you can even type directly "ant" provided you already have junit.jar in your anthome/lib directory). See the "how to build" page for more details.

author: vmassol
msg: this is now an optional file.

author: vmassol
